name: The Aftermath (T-Low)
description:
After a dick move by someone you thought was your friend, you are left to deal with your feelings and them. A game about cybermobbing and dealing with it. 

There's a lot of swearing in this one, be warned y'all.

Originally planned for the I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story jam 2020, but I was late. So I added a little more story, and now I'll put it here. Have fun, I guess.
